data.narrative: At 07:38 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez sits up in bed, the evening light filtering through the blinds. He shakes his head slightly, a lingering grogginess clinging to him after waking up so late. The silence of the apartment is broken only by the distant hum of Brooklyn traffic, a familiar sound in the background as he contemplates his evening.

data.narrative: At 07:38 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel takes a look around his bedroom. A familiar space, even in his groggy state. His **bed (bed_01)**, a queen-sized mattress with a dark blue comforter, dominates the room. A cluttered **desk (desk_01)** sits against the far wall, littered with coding books, empty coffee mugs, and a half-disassembled **keyboard (keyboard_01)**. To the left of the desk, he sees a **door (door_01)**, presumably leading to the hallway. He squints, trying to make out details in the fading light.
